tweet.text: Current or recent grad student in the history of U.S. in the World? Apply to the Presidential Management Fellows Program for a chance to work with @HistoryAtState on the #FRUS series! #PMF applications open Sept. 28 to Oct. 12 https://t.co/9MdLibXAXh https://t.co/2UnvGuJQBq
